jobs.name: Morning System Report
jobs.description: Daily system health and security overview

payload.message: Generate my morning system report. Run these checks: 1) System uptime and load average. 2) Disk usage — flag any partition >85%. 3) Memory usage. 4) Failed systemd services. 5) Pending security updates count. 6) Docker container status (if Docker is running). 7) Last backup status from memory/backups/. 8) Any unusual SSH login attempts in last 24h. Present as a clean dashboard — green/yellow/red status for each.

jobs.name: Security Audit
jobs.description: Weekly security check and hardening review

payload.message: Weekly security audit. 1) List all pending updates — especially security patches. 2) Fail2ban summary: total bans this week, top banned IPs. 3) SSH: failed login attempts summary, any new authorized keys added. 4) Open ports: compare current listening ports against expected list in TOOLS.md. 5) Docker: any containers running as root that shouldn't be? Images with known vulnerabilities? 6) File permissions: any world-writable files in sensitive directories? Recommend actions for any findings.

jobs.name: Backup Verification
jobs.description: Verify backups are running and test restoration

payload.message: Backup verification check. 1) When did the last backup run? Was it successful? 2) Backup size — consistent with previous runs or anomalous? 3) If possible, run a test restore of a small file to verify backup integrity. 4) Check backup retention — are old backups being cleaned up per policy? 5) Update memory/backups/ with verification results.
